author: Diana Gitig
title: Will SARS-CoV-2 have a long-term impact on the climate?
description: Pollution is down now, but policy decisions will drive its future direction.
content:
Enlarge/ China has seen pollution levels plunge.
1 with 1 posters participating
COVID-19 is bad for human activity and enterprise. Human activity and enterprise is bad for the environment. So since our present situation reduces human activity and enterprise… [+5064 chars]
